Desc.entry: A voluntary group which represents the users of Sheffield's maternity services and forms the user group of Sheffield Maternity Services Liaison Committee. Liaises with hospitals, consultants, GPs and professionals to influence matters concerned with maternity care. Self or any referral.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Every 6 weeks, usually on a Friday morning 10am-12noon, please contact for details
